title: The study of Sinbad's personality change in Magi: adventure of Sinbad and Magi: Labyrinth of Magic Manga Series
abstract: This thesis focuses on the journey of Sinbad, the main character of Magi: Adventure of Sinbad and Magi: Labyrinth of Magic Manga series. These manga series present the adventure of an ordinary young boy named Sinbad who became a hero and saved his world from destruction. Sinbad will go through several stages in his journey in order to become a hero. The result of undergoing those stages will affect Sinbad’s personality change that will slowly transform him into a different person than he was before. Because of this, I am interested in analyzing the process of Sinbad’s personality development in his journey to become a hero. I use the monomyth theory to analyze the process of Sinbad’s journey from a nobody to a hero, and the theory of personality development to analyze Sinbad’s personality change throughout his journey. First, I discuss Sinbad’s personality before he embarks on his journey. Second, I discuss the process of Sinbad’s personality change. Lastly, I discuss Sinbad’s personality after his journey.
contributors: Drs. Setefanus Suprajitno, M.A., Ph.D. (Advisor 1); Jenny Mochtar Djundjung (Examination Committee 1); Ribut Basuki (Examination Committee 2)
source: A Critical Thesis No. 01012339/ING/2021; Celine Alexandra Maria Utomo (A11170015)
subjects: HEROES IN LITERATURE; HEROES--COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.; HEROES--FICTION
